original_text: Then King David rose to his feet and said: “Hear me, my brothers and my people. I had it in my heart to build a house of rest for the ark of the covenant of the Lord and for the footstool of our God, and I made preparations for building.
korean_text: 이에 다윗 왕이 일어서서 이르되 나의 형제들, 나의 백성들아 내 말을 들으라 나는 여호와의 언약궤 곧 우리 하나님의 발판을 봉안할 성전을 건축할 마음이 있어서 건축할 재료를 준비하였으나

sentences.original_text: Then King David rose to his feet
Hear me, my brothers and my people.
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 형제들과 나의 백성들아, 내 말을 들으라.

sentences.original_text: I had it in my heart to build a house of rest
for the ark of the covenant of the Lord
and for the footstool of our God,
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 우리 하나님의 발 받침을 위함이며

sentences.original_text: and I made preparations for building.
